thread.title: Man dies following crash on Bristol's A4
thread.title_full: Man dies following crash on Bristol's A4 - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Man dies following crash on Bristol's A4
text:
Mark died after the Audi he was driving collided with another vehicle at 6.20am on Saturday morning Credit: ITV News A man who was killed in a crash on the Portway has been named as Mark Fordham.
Tributes left at the scene describe him as 'full of life'. One reads, 'another great loss, thinking of your wife and boys at this sad time.'
Mark died after the Audi he was driving collided with another vehicle at 6.20am on Saturday morning.
Bristol Portway
